description: The slicer is back and sharper than ever! Fruit Ninja brings the addictive, high-energy action of the world’s most famous fruit-slicing game to the Windows 8 ecosystem. Whether you’re a master sensei or a newcomer to the dojo, Fruit Ninja provides a satisfying blend of simple mechanics and deep, skill-based challenges that are perfect for any device.
